thread.title: King's Cross evacuated due to faulty escalators causing rush hour chaos | Metro News
thread.title_full: King's Cross evacuated due to faulty escalators causing rush hour chaos | Metro News

author: Tomeyjes For Metro.Co.Uk
title: King's Cross evacuated due to faulty escalators causing rush hour chaos | Metro News
text:
Toby Meyjes for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 6:25 pm King’s Cross was closed for 20 minutes due to faulty escalators (Picture: Jon Clifton) 
King’s Cross station was evacuated during rush hour this evening causing chaos on the commute home. 
The station was closed for around 20 minutes due to faulty escalators but has since reopened. 
Commuters reported being asked to leave the station due to a ‘reported emergency’ but TfL has confirmed the station is now open again. 
More to follow.
